General.Name: Guangdong Xianglu Tungsten Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Xianglu Tungsten Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells tungsten products in China. It offers tungsten carbide powder, tungsten powder and trioxide, and blue tungsten oxide products, as well as carbide alloy products. The company also exports its products. Guangdong Xianglu Tungsten Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Chaozhou, China.
General.Address: Guangdong Chaoan Guantang Industrial Zne, Chaozhou, China, 515633
